## 🔔 Description
Implement a real-time notification system with WebSocket support for live updates and notifications.

## 🎯 Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] WebSocket connection management
- [ ] Real-time ticket updates
- [ ] Live notification system
- [ ] Connection state handling
- [ ] Message queuing for offline users
- [ ] Push notification integration
- [ ] Notification preferences
- [ ] Real-time chat support
- [ ] System-wide announcements

## 📋 Tasks

### Backend Real-time Tasks
- [ ] Set up WebSocket server
- [ ] Implement connection management
- [ ] Create notification broadcasting
- [ ] Add message queuing system
- [ ] Implement user presence tracking
- [ ] Create notification routing
- [ ] Add notification persistence
- [ ] Implement rate limiting

### Frontend Real-time Tasks
- [ ] Set up WebSocket client
- [ ] Implement connection management
- [ ] Create notification components
- [ ] Add real-time UI updates
- [ ] Implement notification sounds
- [ ] Create notification center
- [ ] Add notification preferences

## 🔧 Technical Requirements
- WebSocket library (Socket.io)
- Message queue system (Redis)
- Push notification service
- Connection state management
- Notification persistence
- Rate limiting for notifications

## 🔗 Related Issues
- Related to ticket system
- Connected to user management
- Depends on notification preferences

## 📊 Priority: Medium
## 🏷️ Area: Backend, Frontend, Real-time
## ⏱️ Estimated Time: 10-14 hours
